title: La Calandria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Peruvian
description: Reported became all-veg in 2015. Organic restaurant serving salads with lentils, carrots and beet roots, as well as cooked food. Also in the restaurant is a small store that sells all types of organic food. Located in Barranco one block away from Plaza de Barranco on the corner of Miguel Grau. Free Wi-fi.
